transcript: like Chipotle because I could get 100 grams of protein each sitting I have two tortillas which were free each of those were 400 calories a pop I would get a bag of chips which was 700 calories and then I would have a bowl that had double rice double beans double meat which would be a paused double so I'd go half and half chicken and steak because you get like one and a half each time and then I'd be like actually you know what let's make it a double and then they would put another half and half and when they do that they usually give you like a three quarter three quarter so it ended up being like a triple meat and then I would have Pico lettuce sour cream and I did that every day you had a chicken breast to a meal it's a buck and so one day I asked her I was like can I just have all chicken breasts and not have a meal they were like sure if you want to and I was like how many can I have they're like as many as you want I said can I have six chicken breasts and they're like okay that's six dollars I got six chicken breasts and I said how many sauces can I have they're like they're free I have as many as you want I got honey mustard I got barbecue I got ketchup I got Mayo I mixed all those together and I was able to eat 100 150 grams of protein in one sitting for under six bucks as a single guy who had no money
